TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlFileEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for selecting an XML file using a standard box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlFileEditor> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that provides a dialog for selecting an XML file for a file name property.
## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#2)]

Docs.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
Docs.summary: Edits the value of the specified object using the specified service provider and context.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, this method should return the same object it was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.

Docs.param: An that can be used to gain additional context information.
Docs.summary: Gets the editing style associated with this editor, using the specified object.
Docs.returns: A enumeration value indicating the provided editing style. If the method is not supported in the specified context, this will return the identifier.
